data.persona: I officiate over weddings.  I dislike the dark arts.  I perform exorcisms.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Church.
Small wooden crucifix decorations, wooden benches, small and dim windows, wooden walls, vases on small pillars, plants near church entrance
There's some wooden crucifix decorations, an old bible, an empty coin bag, a stained glass, some wooden walls, some plants, some windows, some dim windows, some wooden benches, some vases, and some pillars here.

You are carrying a bible, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I will use the empty coin bag and put the bible in it.
data.mid_motivation: I will hang the coin bag on by back and raise both hands to perform exorcisms.
data.long_motivation: I will carry out exorcisms and drive away all the ghosts in the area.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the altar to perform exorcism.
